metrics.disclaimer: Includes non-GAAP constant currency ('CC') growth and free cash flow. See Appendix for reconciliation of GAAP and non-GAAP measures. Growth rates in GAAP and CC are equivalent.

tables.notes: Growth rates include non-GAAP CC growth (GAAP % / CC %)

metrics.yoy_change: Office Commercial products and cloud services revenue grew 13%, Office 365 Commercial revenue grew 15%, Office 365 Commercial seat growth of 8%, Office Commercial products revenue declined 20%, LinkedIn revenue grew 10%, LinkedIn sessions grew 11%, Dynamics products and cloud services revenue grew 19%, Dynamics 365 revenue grew 23%, Office Consumer products and cloud services revenue grew 4%, Microsoft 365 Consumer subscribers grew 14%
metrics.fx_adjusted: Office Commercial products and cloud services revenue grew 12% CC, Office Commercial products revenue declined 18% CC, LinkedIn revenue grew 9% CC, Dynamics 365 revenue grew 22% CC

metrics.yoy_change: Revenue grew 21% (driven by Azure), Gross margin dollars grew 20%, Operating expenses grew 1% (driven by investments in Azure), Operating income grew 32%
